start.npcText: Hi, Annie, Welcome to your first day at work.

pcOptions.text: Thanks, but I’d rather be at home playing video games.

s1.npcText: Oh, well, I’d heard you had a bit of an awkward personality.

pcOptions.text: They call me Awkward Annie.  Everyone has their strength - mine is saying inappropriate things.
Yeah, well I like being “special”. I’m like a special agent of awkwardness. Unstoppable awkwardness!

s3.npcText: Ok.  So are you ready to start your first day at work?

pcOptions.text: I sure am. Let’s get things started. This should be a fun day.
What? You don’t like my “special agent of awkwardness” joke? What happened to your sense of humor? Oh, no. Is this a boring office?

s3a.npcText: I’m surprised you don’t have something more awkward to say. So are you ready to start your first day at work?

pcOptions.text: I sure am. Let’s get things started. This should be a fun day.
What? You don’t like my “special agent of awkwardness” joke? What happened to your sense of humor? Oh, no. Is this a boring office?

s4.npcText: What? No, people definitely have a sense of humor. You just tend to take things a bit farther than most people do. I forgot what it’s like to be "Awkward Annie.” Anyway, I think it’s time to meet in the lobby.

pcOptions.text: Thanks. That would really be nice of you.
The lobby?! That sounds like a great place to get this party started! You do have party decorations and noise makers, right? A dance party always gets the day started right.

s4a.npcText: I’m surprised you don’t have something more awkward to say, Annie.

pcOptions.text: Thanks. That would really be nice of you.
The lobby?! That sounds like a great place to get this party started! You do have party decorations and noise makers, right? A dance party always gets the day started right.

s5.npcText: You’ll certainly make this office more interesting. I’m sure your awkward annie shenanigans will liven things up around here. As they say - you do you, Awkward Annie.
